title: Update with group price for the 22 t222s .....heavy discount!!
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Update with group price for the 22 t222s .....heavy discount!!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen
Here is a great group of t222s that I'll offer up on a first come, first served basis.  Prices below include shipping.  All are very nice, no beaters here. There are very few cards with significant creasing in this group.  Many only have a mild bend/wrinkle or two.  In addition, there is very little wear or damage on any of the cards. Scans of any of these are available upon request.

I'll also offer discounts for those wanting a few of the cards or the entire group - this would make a nice lot to start a set with if anyone was interested in the entire lot.   Anyone who'd be interested in acquiring this entire group would be just about halfway done with this very difficult set right from the start.

Thanks in advance,
Brian
redmaccie@hotmail.com 


t222 Jimmy Austin  (HIGH NUMBER)   Good - toned/faint wrinkling --- $275
t222 Jack Barry GD - (tiny chip upper right corner); no creases --- $135

t222 Ossie Vitt GD - a few smaller bends --- $135
t222 Heinie Zimmerman GD - a few bends on card --- $135

posts.post_title: Update with group price for the 22 t222s .....heavy discount!!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen

So far, the Leach has been sold with the other cards still remaining.  I've been asked a couple times about a group price for everything.  Minus the Leach, the listed individual prices for the remaining 22 cards totals $3495.  If someone were to want the entire group I would knock an additional $500 off the group and sell it for an even $3000 delivered.  

It's a pretty big discount in my opinion but it does save me the trouble of selling and shipping the 22 cards individually.  Also, I have large numbers of e98s and zeenuts coming in, so I need to make some room [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

Thanks guys,
Brian
redmaccie@hotmail.com
